subject: Attention Beneficiary,
body:
Attention Beneficiary,
This message is officially bring to you from International Monterey
Fund (IMF) director Mrs Kristalina Georgieva,that sum of disclosed
millions of dollar which was deposited in your favor was mishandled by
the official who has been using this fund to extort some money from
you for one reason or the other.
We learnt that they are still demanding some money from in the sense
that you will receive your fund through diplomatic or through bank
wire transfer.
You are here by order to stop further communication with them or any
means of payment to them as the money you are chasing after is under
our custody now.
you are advice to contact (IMF) Director now at (
mgeorgieva111@aol.com
 ) Kindly reconfirm your full name and home
address and phone number to claim your fund without delay.
You will pay sum of $153 for affidavit stamp and your fund will
activated be delivered to you
.
Thanks
Edward Benson

subject: Re: Attention Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Edward Benson,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. It's quite surprising to hear about the mishandling of such a large sum of money. I'm glad that it's now under your custody and safe from any further misuse.

I have a few questions though, if you don't mind. Could you please explain more about what the Monterey Fund IMF is? And how did my name come up in relation to this fund?

Also, could you clarify what the affidavit stamp is for and why there's a fee associated with it? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Eugene
